title: How to Make At Tahiyyat (Tashahhud)? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Malaysia Sheikh I just have
one question regarding about how to make tahiyyat last Tashahud so basically I watched the video
on authentic sunnah to pray like the Prophet Muhammed (Peace and Blessing upon him) but
when I watched to the final part the way you say I mean the way the Prophet (Peace and
Blessing upon him) says his Tashahud is different than the one Im taught in my country in Malaysia,
so is the tahiyyat tashahud correct, is this correct, yes it is, Alhamdulillah, yes this
is authentic because there are 3 or 4 different versions of Al tahiyyat and the one you mentioned
is also authentic without any problem insha Allah
